subject: Golf
PGA Championship
Pensions and Retirement Plans
Retirement
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson whined a bit recently that the winner’s prize for the four-tournament FedEx Cup playoff will be inaccessible until the victor is at least 45.
snippet: Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson whined a bit recently that the winner’s prize for the four-tournament FedEx Cup playoff will be inaccessible until the victor is at least 45.
